Symbol.Script_1D:
dim stEndFrameProfile[3] stEndFrameProfile[1] = `Обычный` stEndFrameProfile[2] = `Соединение` stEndFrameProfile[3] = `Угол`
ENDFRAME_NORMAL = 1 ENDFRAME_JOINT = 2 ENDFRAME_CORNER = 3
! iFrameStyleLeft, iFrameStyleRight: FRAME_STYLE_VISIBLE_MULLIONS = 1 FRAME_STYLE_BUTT_GLAZED = 2 FRAME_STYLE_BUTT_GLAZED_WO_FRAME = 3 FRAME_STYLE_ANGLE_FRAME = 4
dim stFrameStyle[4] stFrameStyle[1] = `Видимые Профили` stFrameStyle[2] = `Застекленная` stFrameStyle[3] = `Застекленная без Коробки` stFrameStyle[4] = `Угловая Коробка`
Symbol.Script_UI:
! iStorefrontType SFTYPE_DOOR_ONLY = 1 SFTYPE_DOOR_TRANSOM = 2 SFTYPE_DOOR_TRSL = 3
dim gs_ui_frame[16] gs_ui_frame[ 1] = `Коробка` gs_ui_frame[ 2] = `Толщина Коробки:` gs_ui_frame[ 3] = `Соединение Слева` gs_ui_frame[ 4] = `Стиль Коробки Слева:` gs_ui_frame[ 5] = `Левый Угол` gs_ui_frame[ 6] = `Угол Слева:` gs_ui_frame[ 7] = `Толщина Коробки=Толщине Стены` gs_ui_frame[ 8] = `Ширина Коробки:` gs_ui_frame[ 9] = `Соединение Справа` gs_ui_frame[10] = `Стиль Коробки Справа:` gs_ui_frame[11] = `Правый Угол` gs_ui_frame[12] = `Угол Справа:` gs_ui_frame[13] = stFrameStyle[2] gs_ui_frame[14] = stFrameStyle[1] gs_ui_frame[15] = stFrameStyle[3] gs_ui_frame[16] = stFrameStyle[4]
pageStartY = 0 xPic = 10 xPic2 = 25 x1 = 10 x2 = 120 x3 = 190 x4 = 245 x5 = 365 x6 = 435 dy = 23 yCurr = pageStartY + 2 y0 = pageStartY + 2
ui_infield{3} "gs_wthk", x1, 266-21, 222-x1, 19, 7, "", 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, "", `Толщина Коробки=Толщине Стены`, 0, "", `Толщина Коробки=Толщине Стены`, 1
ui_infield{3} "gs_stack_top", x1, 266-2*21, 222-x1, 19, 7, "", 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, "", `Верхнее Соединение`, 0, "", `Верхнее Соединение`, 1
ui_outfield `Профиль Конечной Рамы Слева`, x1, yCurr, x3-x1, 15 yCurr = yCurr + dy
ui_infield{3} "iEndFrameLeft", x1, yCurr-4, x3-x1, 19, 8, "", 3, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1, stEndFrameProfile[1], ENDFRAME_NORMAL, 2, stEndFrameProfile[2], ENDFRAME_JOINT, 3, stEndFrameProfile[3], ENDFRAME_CORNER yCurr = yCurr + dy
if iEndFrameLeft = ENDFRAME_CORNER then ui_outfield `Угол Слева:`, x1, yCurr, x2-x1-2, 15 ui_infield "leftCornerAngle", x2, yCurr-4, x3-x2, 19 endif
yCurr = yCurr + dy
if iStorefrontType <> SFTYPE_DOOR_ONLY then ui_outfield gs_ui_frame[4], x1, yCurr, x3-x1, 15 yCurr = yCurr + dy
ui_infield{3} "iFrameStyleLeft", x1, yCurr-4, x3-x1, 19, 8, "", 4, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1, stFrameStyle[1], FRAME_STYLE_VISIBLE_MULLIONS, 2, stFrameStyle[2], FRAME_STYLE_BUTT_GLAZED, 3, stFrameStyle[3], FRAME_STYLE_BUTT_GLAZED_WO_FRAME, 4, stFrameStyle[4], FRAME_STYLE_ANGLE_FRAME
endif
yCurr = y0 ui_outfield `Профиль Конечной Рамы Справа`, x4, yCurr, x6-x4, 15 yCurr = yCurr + dy
ui_infield{3} "iEndFrameRight", x4, yCurr-4, x6-x4, 19, 8, "", 3, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1, stEndFrameProfile[1], ENDFRAME_NORMAL, 2, stEndFrameProfile[2], ENDFRAME_JOINT, 3, stEndFrameProfile[3], ENDFRAME_CORNER yCurr = yCurr + dy
if iEndFrameRight = ENDFRAME_CORNER then ui_outfield `Угол Справа:`, x4, yCurr, x5-x4-2, 15 ui_infield "rightCornerAngle", x5, yCurr-4, x6-x5, 19 endif
yCurr = yCurr + dy
if iStorefrontType <> SFTYPE_DOOR_ONLY then ui_outfield gs_ui_frame[10], x4, yCurr, x6-x4, 15 yCurr = yCurr + dy
ui_infield{3} "iFrameStyleRight", x4, yCurr-4, x6-x4, 19, 8, "", 4, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1, stFrameStyle[1], FRAME_STYLE_VISIBLE_MULLIONS, 2, stFrameStyle[2], FRAME_STYLE_BUTT_GLAZED, 3, stFrameStyle[3], FRAME_STYLE_BUTT_GLAZED_WO_FRAME, 4, stFrameStyle[4], FRAME_STYLE_ANGLE_FRAME endif
yCurr = yCurr + dy ui_outfield "(1)", x1, yCurr, 17, 15, 4*(gs_wthk) ui_outfield `Толщина Коробки:`, x1+18, yCurr, x2-x1-20, 15, 4*(gs_wthk) ui_infield "gs_frame_thk", x2, yCurr-4, x3-x2, 19
ui_outfield "(2)", x4, yCurr, 17, 15 ui_outfield `Ширина Коробки:`, x4+18, yCurr, x5-x4-20, 15 ui_infield "gs_frame_width", x5, yCurr-4, x6-x5, 19
xPic = 28 xPic2 = 239 yPic = yCurr + dy - 3
if iEndFrameLeft = ENDFRAME_JOINT then if iFrameStyleLeft = FRAME_STYLE_BUTT_GLAZED then ui_pict "sf_jlb(13)", xPic, yPic, 211, 69, 1 if iFrameStyleLeft = FRAME_STYLE_VISIBLE_MULLIONS then ui_pict "sf_jlv(13)", xPic, yPic, 211, 69, 1 else if iEndFrameLeft = ENDFRAME_CORNER then if iFrameStyleLeft = FRAME_STYLE_VISIBLE_MULLIONS then ui_pict "sf_vmlj(13)", xPic, yPic, 211, 69, 1 if iFrameStyleLeft = FRAME_STYLE_BUTT_GLAZED then ui_pict "sf_bglj(13)", xPic, yPic, 211, 69, 1 if iFrameStyleLeft = FRAME_STYLE_BUTT_GLAZED_WO_FRAME then ui_pict "sf_bgvflj(13)", xPic, yPic, 211, 69, 1 if iFrameStyleLeft = FRAME_STYLE_ANGLE_FRAME then ui_pict "sf_aflj(13)", xPic, yPic, 211, 69, 1 else if iFrameStyleLeft = FRAME_STYLE_BUTT_GLAZED then ui_pict "sf_frame1 closebutt(13)", xPic, yPic, 211, 69, 1 if iFrameStyleLeft = FRAME_STYLE_VISIBLE_MULLIONS then ui_pict "sf_frame1 close(13)", xPic, yPic, 211, 69, 1 endif endif
if iEndFrameRight = ENDFRAME_JOINT then if iFrameStyleRight = FRAME_STYLE_BUTT_GLAZED then ui_pict "sf_jrb(13)", xPic2, yPic, 179, 69, 1 if iFrameStyleRight = FRAME_STYLE_VISIBLE_MULLIONS then ui_pict "sf_jrv(13)", xPic2, yPic, 179, 69, 1 else if iEndFrameRight = ENDFRAME_CORNER then if iFrameStyleRight = FRAME_STYLE_VISIBLE_MULLIONS then ui_pict "sf_vmrj(13)", xPic2, yPic, 179, 69, 1 if iFrameStyleRight = FRAME_STYLE_BUTT_GLAZED then ui_pict "sf_bgrj(13)", xPic2, yPic, 179, 69, 1 if iFrameStyleRight = FRAME_STYLE_BUTT_GLAZED_WO_FRAME then ui_pict "sf_bgvfrj(13)", xPic2, yPic, 179, 69, 1 if iFrameStyleRight = FRAME_STYLE_ANGLE_FRAME then ui_pict "sf_afrj(13)", xPic2, yPic, 179, 69, 1 else if iFrameStyleRight = FRAME_STYLE_BUTT_GLAZED then ui_pict "sf_frame2 closebutt(13)", xPic2, yPic, 179, 69, 1 if iFrameStyleRight = FRAME_STYLE_VISIBLE_MULLIONS then ui_pict "sf_frame2 close(13)", xPic2, yPic, 179, 69, 1 endif endif
ui_outfield "1", 217, yPic+25, 17, 15 ui_outfield "2", 262, yPic+69, 15, 15 ui_outfield "2", 172, yPic+69, 15, 15

Boolean.Name: AC_HoleMaterialCurved
Boolean.Description: "Hole Surface's Split is Curved in Curved Walls"
